DocAttribute.Name: Coordinates
DocAttribute.Documentation: An ordered list of Cartesian points used by the coordinate index defined at the subtypes of _IfcTessellatedFaceSet_.

DocAttribute.Name: Closed
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication whether the _IfcPolygonalFaceSet_ is a closed shell or not. If omited no such information can be provided.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this geometric representation item, it is always 3.

DocAttribute.Name: HasColours
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the indexed colour map providing the corresponding colour RGB values to the faces of the subtypes of _IfcTessellatedFaceSet_.

DocAttribute.Name: HasTextures
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the indexed texture map providing the corresponding texture coordinates to the vertices bounding the faces of the subtypes of _IfcTessellatedFaceSet_.
